steps.text: The shopkeeper of Farm shop has sought Arya's help to provide the desired products to the customers.
There are farms surrounding the shop. Navigate Arya to the suitable farm to obtain flowers from the plants and fulfill all orders.
The customer wants to make garlands for house decoration.

question.text: Help Arya by opening the right gate that leads to the plant farm whose flowers can be used to make garlands.

feedBack.text: Nope! The flowers of the shajan plant are not suitable for making garlands. However, they can be used to prepare dishes and even medicines.
Uh-oh! We cannot make garlands from the flowers of cotton plant. However, we can obtain fibres from them.
Correct! Marigold can be used to make garlands for decoration purposes.

steps.text: The customer wants to obtain flowers that can be used to make cutlets.

question.text: Help Arya by opening the right gate that leads to the plant farm whose flowers can be used to make cutlets.

feedBack.text: Great! Cutlets can be made from the flowers of shajan plant. The flowers have nutritional properties and are used to make food items.
Uh-oh! The flowers of cotton plant will not be useful in making cutlets. They are instead processed to make cloth fibres.
Incorrect! The marigold plant's flowers aren't suitable for making cutlets. Marigold, on the other hand, can be used for dyes, medicines and decoration purposes.

steps.text: The customer wants flowers to make a beautiful bouquet.

question.text: Help Arya by opening the right gate that leads to the plant farm whose flowers can be used to make a bouquet.

feedBack.text: Nope! Cauliflowers cannot be used to make a bouquet. These are used as food items as they have a high nutritional value.
Incorrect! We cannot make a bouquet from the flowers of the banana plant. They are used to make medicines or cooked to prepare tasty dishes.
Yes! Tulips are flowers that are used for decorative purposes as they look pretty. Thus, these can be used to make a bouquet.

steps.text: The customer wishes to obtain dye.

question.text: Help Arya by opening the right gate that leads to the plant farms whose flowers can be used to make dye.

feedBack.text: Correct! We can make dyes of different colours from the flowers of marigold and rose plants.
Nope! We can make dyes from flowers of the rose plant but cauliflower cannot be used to make dyes.
Incorrect! We can make dyes from flowers of the marigold plant but cauliflower cannot be used to make dyes.

steps.text: The customer wants to make attar.

question.text: Help Arya by opening the right gate that leads to the plant farms whose flowers can be used to make attar.

feedBack.text: Yes! Attar can be made from the flowers of jasmine and rose plants as these are naturally fragrant.
Nope! We can obtain attar from rose flowers, however, banana plant has medicinal properties and its flowers are not fragrant enough to make attar.
Uh-oh! We can obtain attar from jasmine flowers, however, banana plant has medicinal properties and its flowers are not fragrant enough to make attar.

steps.text: The customer wants flowers to make medicines.

question.text: Help Arya by opening the right gate that leads to the plant farms whose flowers can be used to make medicines.

feedBack.text: Correct! We can obtain medicines from the flowers of hibiscus and banana plants as they have various medicinal properties.
No! We can obtain medicines from the flowers of banana plant as it has various medicinal properties but a cauliflower has more nutritional property and is used as food.
Incorrect! We can obtain medicines from the flowers of hibiscus plant as it has various medicinal properties but a cauliflower has more nutritional property and is used as food.

steps.text: Good Job! You have completed the orders from all the customers by choosing the correct flowers.
